title: Visual Product Analyzer
description: Build an AI-powered product analysis tool that compares product images, extracts features, and generates recommendations
learningObjectives: Implement Claude vision API for image analysis
Extract structured data from product images
Create recommendation engine based on visual features

technical: Use Claude API with vision capability
Handle image upload and base64 encoding
Support multiple image formats (JPEG, PNG, WebP)
Optimize image size for API calls
ui: Analysis results display with image thumbnails

successCriteria.description: Correctly identifies products, extracts key features, accurate descriptions
Meaningful comparisons with visual evidence, highlights key differences
Smooth upload, clear results, intuitive comparison interface
Helpful recommendations based on features and use case
Clean code, proper error handling, good UI/UX

testProducts: Compare similar products (e.g., two coffee makers)

technicalGuidance.imageFormat: Convert images to base64 with proper media type (image/jpeg, image/png)
technicalGuidance.apiUsage: Use claude-3-5-sonnet-20250129 model with vision capability
technicalGuidance.multiImageLimit: Claude supports up to 5 images per request - batch wisely
technicalGuidance.promptPattern: Combine visual analysis request with structured output format
technicalGuidance.optimization: Resize large images to max 1568px on longest side before encoding
technicalGuidance.caching: Cache analysis results for same product to reduce API costs

deploymentRequirements.instructions: Deploy to Vercel, configure API key, test image upload limits

extensionIdeas: Add OCR for extracting text from product labels
Build price comparison with web scraping
Build product review summarization from images

rubric.exceeds: Analyzes 3+ products accurately, comparisons are insightful with visual evidence, UI is polished, recommendations are helpful, proper error handling
rubric.meets: Analyzes 2+ products, basic comparisons work, functional UI, some recommendations, handles common errors
rubric.approaching: Single product analysis works, limited comparison features, basic UI, few recommendations
rubric.incomplete: Image upload fails, analysis errors, or comparison not working
